rows.translation: We have indeed revealed this (Message) in the Night of Power:

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.translation: And what will explain to thee what the night of power is?
rows.transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā laylatul qadr

rows.arabic: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
rows.translation: The Night of Power is better than a thousand months.
rows.transliteration: laylatul qadri khayrun min alfi shahr

rows.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
rows.translation: Therein come down the angels and the Spirit by Allah's permission, on every errand:
rows.transliteration: tanazzalul malā-ikatu war rūḥu fīhā bi-idhni rabbihim min kulli amr

rows.translation: Peace!... This until the rise of morn!
